Reviews.Title: So much for technology
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these dogs and it lasted three weeks before the battery would no longer charge. The initial phone could not hold a charge longer that 30 or so hours. I received a replacement and apparently the company was aware their batteries were insufficient. The new one came with a battery three times as big which now protrudes out the back a half an inch and weighs almost a pound. It feels like someones hand is in my pocket now though it has extended the charge a whole six hours! With all the fabulous technology in this highly advanced phone it lacks one of the most important features necessary in a phone, the ability to redial a number from someone that has called you. That is apparently a service for this phone that must be paid for and not available to prepaid phone users. I liked the features on the phone but they are useless without an extension cord.

Reviews.Title: The phone might be good if it had a decent battery!
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: I regret buying this phone. I feel I was cheated. The battery life is non existent. I have to charge the phones battery daily and I only make approximately 4 calls per day at about 5 minutes or less per call.

Reviews.Title: not good service.
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Lapointe
Reviews.Content: the phone itself is durable like he wanted. The only problem is it doesn't get good service.. This phone is used for business. Good service is a must.

Reviews.Title: casio
Reviews.Author: brandy
Reviews.Content: Casio phone is working good so far for my sons first phone. It seems to be easy to use for him.

Reviews.Title: It can teleport you up to 3,000 miles
Reviews.Author: Michelle Gabriel
Reviews.Content: At 6,000 dollars, it's a steal! 10/10 it flies and dispenses your favorite soda. Bad reception, but it's a good price.

Reviews.Title: Phone works great for me except no web browsing for Page Plus Celluar
Reviews.Author: OldRaschal
Reviews.Content: I like the phone okay but, I do feel it is a replica of the older version. Phone will not get on the Web service for PagePlus Cellular maybe Verizon I do not know.

Reviews.Title: just like other reviews-
Reviews.Author: Russell Butler
Reviews.Content: rugged but lowsy speaker, battery very poor, echos, pretty color,would not recommend to anyone but hey I do not want to buy a smart phone at the moment so it will have to do

Reviews.Title: PHONE WONT CHARGE THE AREA WHERE YOU CHARGE IT IS TORN-UP
Reviews.Author: tina stevens
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM IS TORN-UP THE CHARGEING AREA IS MISSED UP...THE WHILE CHARGEING THING PULLS OUT AS YOU TRY TO CHARGE IT.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Brandon Mildren
Reviews.Content: Works great looks good and is best if you are rough on phones like I am.  My second Gzone phone and I have liked them both.
